question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: En la ciudad japonesa de Kanazawa, ¿cómo se llama el museo dedicado al arte contemporáneo inaugurado en 2004?
answer: El museo dedicado al arte contemporáneo inaugurado en 2004 en la ciudad japonesa de Kanazawa se llama Museo del Siglo XXI de Arte Contemporáneo de Kanazawa.
answer_translated_eng: The museum dedicated to contemporary art opened in 2004 in the Japanese city of Kanazawa is called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art Kanazawa.
